meanings.definition: Engaging or absorbing the interest or attention of someone
meanings.sent1: The preoccupying book kept me entertained for hours.
meanings.sent2: The movie was so preoccupying that I lost track of time.
meanings.sent3: The preoccupying puzzle made me forget about everything else.
meanings.sent4: Her preoccupying smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The preoccupying painting captured my imagination.

meanings.definition: To occupy or absorb the thoughts or attention of someone
meanings.sent1: The mystery novel preoccupying her mind was hard to put down.
meanings.sent2: The upcoming exam preoccupying him made it hard to focus on anything else.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a surprise party preoccupying her thoughts made her excited.
meanings.sent4: His fear of failure preoccupying his mind was like a dark cloud hanging over him.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the waves preoccupying her attention was calming.
